table_caption: Tabel 2. Association diffusion parameters of the CC and memory performance.
table_foot: Data are presented as standardized regression coefficients with 95% CI.Model 1: adjusted for age, sex, level of education.Model 2: Model 1+adjustment for the planar diffusion coefficient, reflecting the degree of fiber organization complexity.Regression coefficients obtained with DTI and CSD based FT did not differ significantly, assessed with Steiger’s Z-statistic.
